attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: restore some of the monies taken from us when you first became chancellor have not had an increase since you came to power you seem to have deliberately tried to destroy private pensions.mr.raymond thompson

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
